item.description: Hey folks, I'm going to drive up to Gunstock in Guilford NH on Sunday. Its a 100 minute drive from where I live in Brighton. I have two open seats in my car if anyone wants a ride up. If enough people are interested we can figure out more elaborate carpool arrangements for other drivers. I'm leaving at 7:30 am and hope to be at the mountain buying a ticket at 10:30 am. Please someone else go so I have someone to talk to on the drive! :-)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the Santa hat

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Gunstock Nordic Touring , Guilford NH
